entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for August 29, 2024

summary.caption: “Wouldn’t you know it! ... And always just before a big date!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for August 29, 2024

summary.caption: “I wasn’t just whistling ‘Dixie’! … Sam, were you just whistling ‘Dixie’?”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for August 29, 2024

summary.caption: “Well, that does it! Look at our furniture! The Shuelers have visited us for the last time!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for August 29, 2024

summary.caption: “And next, for show-and-tell, Bobby Henderson says he has something he found on the beach last summer. …”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for August 29, 2024

summary.caption: The livestock would gather every morning, hoping for one of Farmer Dan’s popular “airplane” rides.
